meanings.sent1: My copemate and I enjoy going on walks together.
meanings.sent2: I consider my dog to be my loyal copemate.
meanings.sent3: Having a copemate like you makes life more fun!
meanings.sent4: She is the copemate who always has my back.
meanings.sent5: My copemate is like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.

meanings.definition: To be a companion or friend to someone.
meanings.sent1: I copemate with my sister whenever she feels lonely.
meanings.sent2: As a pet owner, it is important to copemate with your animals.
meanings.sent3: I copemate with my plants by talking to them every day.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and warmth copemate with everyone she meets.
meanings.sent5: The old man would copemate with the birds in the park, feeding them daily.
